# This file is automatically generated from cmake.toml - DO NOT EDIT
# See https://github.com/build-cpp/cmkr for more information

# Create a configure-time dependency on cmake.toml to improve IDE support
if(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT)
	configure_file(cmake.toml cmake.toml COPYONLY)
endif()

# Options
option(ZYDIS_BUILD_SHARED_LIB "" OFF)
option(ZYDIS_BUILD_EXAMPLES "" OFF)
option(ZYDIS_BUILD_TOOLS "" OFF)
option(ZYDIS_FUZZ_AFL_FAST "" OFF)
option(ZYDIS_LIBFUZZER "" OFF)
option(LIEF_DOC "" OFF)
option(LIEF_PYTHON_API "" OFF)
option(LIEF_EXAMPLES "" OFF)
option(LIEF_TESTS "" OFF)

# Subdirectory: zydis
set(CMKR_CMAKE_FOLDER ${CMAKE_FOLDER})
if(CMAKE_FOLDER)
	set(CMAKE_FOLDER "${CMAKE_FOLDER}/zydis")
else()
	set(CMAKE_FOLDER zydis)
endif()
add_subdirectory(zydis)
set(CMAKE_FOLDER ${CMKR_CMAKE_FOLDER})

# Subdirectory: LIEF
set(CMKR_CMAKE_FOLDER ${CMAKE_FOLDER})
if(CMAKE_FOLDER)
	set(CMAKE_FOLDER "${CMAKE_FOLDER}/LIEF")
else()
	set(CMAKE_FOLDER LIEF)
endif()
add_subdirectory(LIEF)
set(CMAKE_FOLDER ${CMKR_CMAKE_FOLDER})

# Subdirectory: fmt
set(CMKR_CMAKE_FOLDER ${CMAKE_FOLDER})
if(CMAKE_FOLDER)
	set(CMAKE_FOLDER "${CMAKE_FOLDER}/fmt")
else()
	set(CMAKE_FOLDER fmt)
endif()
add_subdirectory(fmt)
set(CMAKE_FOLDER ${CMKR_CMAKE_FOLDER})

# Subdirectory: googletest
set(CMKR_CMAKE_FOLDER ${CMAKE_FOLDER})
if(CMAKE_FOLDER)
	set(CMAKE_FOLDER "${CMAKE_FOLDER}/googletest")
else()
	set(CMAKE_FOLDER googletest)
endif()
add_subdirectory(googletest)
set(CMAKE_FOLDER ${CMKR_CMAKE_FOLDER})

# Subdirectory: argparse
set(CMKR_CMAKE_FOLDER ${CMAKE_FOLDER})
if(CMAKE_FOLDER)
	set(CMAKE_FOLDER "${CMAKE_FOLDER}/argparse")
else()
	set(CMAKE_FOLDER argparse)
endif()
add_subdirectory(argparse)
set(CMAKE_FOLDER ${CMKR_CMAKE_FOLDER})
